Rewriting Kodaira vanishing

Jun 23, 2020

The goal of this post is to suggest a way of rewriting about Kodaira vanishing via Hochschild homology. I’m writing this in part so that I can reference the indexing easily in the future.

First, recall that if is any ring and is a smooth proper -scheme of dimension , then there is a quasicoherent sheaf on such that . It will be more convenient to work with the filtration , so that there are maps , and (in particular, for ).

I want there to be a noncommutative analogue of this result, but cannot figure out what it would be. Thought maybe this’d help, but doesn’t seem like it.
